title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the java file (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename in the dialog, but ignore the extension, as it is not requested
7) Click 'Ok'

Observed Behavior:
The Navigator view shows the file added at the specified location, but no file extension is shown for the newly saved file.

Expected Behavior:
EB: The Navigator view should show the file added at the specified location with the appropriate file extension.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the java file (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename in the dialog, but ignore the extension, as it is not requested
7) Click 'Ok'

Observe that the Navigator view shows the file added at the specified location, but no file extension is shown for the newly saved file.
